description.value: The FeedingMethod concept of zib FeedingPatternInfant.

purpose.value: This extension represents the FeedingMethod concept of the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) FeedingPatternInfant-v1.1(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/FeedingPatternInfant-v1.1(2020EN)).

definition.value: The method how the feeding is given to the infant.
